contents.Header2: Display album art while playing music

contents.Text: This will enable album art to be shown

contents.Header2: Display album art in the center

contents.Text: Enabled: This will put album art in the center of the screen
Disabled: This will put album art on the sidebar
Enabled: keeps displaying a image after a songs ends until a new song is queued
Disabled: clear images from memory on music stop
Enabled: Hides image from being displayed by does not clear memory
This pads images to center them and adds a effect on the padding area
